reviewText:
Hi,
I really like Ben 10 a lot I have all the DVD's I wish that Ben 10 Secret of the Omnitrix would come out on DVD I do hope that it will be soon. I do hope that Ben 10 stays on for a long time thank you.

  Candy

It's Cartoon Network's second live-action movie and it's a really great one, too !

"Ben 10: Race Against Time" has Ben (played by Graham Phillips) back in his hometown of Bellwood.  Even though he's back in school and leaving his hero adventures behind him, it seems that Ben will be facing his greatest challenge yet.  An evil alien named Eon has risen and seeks Ben and his Omnitrix.  Now Ben - along with Gwen (Haley Ramm), Grandpa Max (Lee Majors), and the last remaining "Plumbers" - must defeat Eon once and for all or the entire world is doomed !  Experience the movie and its great effects, plus see Ben turn into some of your fav alien heroes like you've never seen them before !

Also on this cool DVD, there are lots of behind-the-scenes bonus features like interviews with the cast and more !

One more thing for all you Ben fans out there: don't miss the new series "Ben 10 Alien Force" premiering real soon !  It's gonna be really cool !
my 8 year son dalton enjoyed the movie so much that he wants to be like ben when he turns 10
No stars because the disc doesn't play
Son loved them!
love it
One of my son's favorite movie. Delivery was fast
Grandson approved
Very prompt shipping, but one small section of the disc is unplayable. Overall, I am very happy with this purchase. I recommend this service for games and DVD's.
My boys (ages 10 & 13) like this movie.  The acting is not so great but it's a tolerable movie.  Certainly worth the $4 I paid for the movie & shipping.
thank
It's awesome u get to see about half of the aliens in the movie it's really cool
The movie arrived on time, was in good condition and Jay has been enjoying it daily.  I don't watch his DVD's so can not comment on content.
My grandson is so intrigued by all things Ben 10, I felt the need to get his the "watch" and a couple of other things.
i ordered this for my grandson. he was disappointed in it.. i would not recommend this movie. as far as condition of dvd of the dvd, it was in good condition.
Horrible movie.  Kids who are obsessed with Ben 10 right now even said "Well, it's okay."  But any kids loving Ben 10 will have some fun with it.
My son bought this with his allowance. He has watched it a few times and really enjoyed it. Thanks much!
My son is a Ben 10 fan and I got him this movie he had never seen and it's his new favorite!
My son is all about Ben 10.  He was so excited to get this movie. Delivery was fast.  I am sure I will be watching it over and over!

I bought this from a vendor in England. Unfortunately, the European DVD code does not work in the US DVD's. So it is worthless. To ship it back would cost more than what I paid for it. Lesson learned. Never buy DVD's from outside the US.

I loved this movie.  I am a grandmother and a major Lee Majors fan!
My grandchildren will enjoy this at Christmas this year--I am planning ahead:)
For Lee Majors fans, this is a must- have.

My son is on a recent Ben 10 kick.  He really wanted this video, it arrived quickly, in great shape and my son loves it.  I will not hesitate to purchase from this seller again. Thanks.

Lori

The problem, I suppose, is that I expected more. The special effects in this movie are not particularly special, and look a little like they were filmed at a very low budget studio. Maybe they were. Also, the plot is somewhat convoluted. Personally, I like the cartoons better, but the 5 year old fan loves this movie, which is what counts.

Race Against Time features the original aliens from the first Ben 10 series, and includes a Ben who's supposed to be about 10 (though the actor looks a little older).  If you want a teenaged Ben and aliens from the Alien Force series, look for the movie Ben 10 Alien Swarm (also live action).

Race Against Time also features Gwen and Grandpa Max (and the Rustbucket).  Don't expect to see all 10 aliens featured in the movie--it only includes Heatblast, Grey Matter, Diamondhead, and Wildmutt, and the special effects  are fine (actually, very cool for a kid's movie).  Overall, an oft-watched choice for our Ben 10 fan.

My son is totally in love with all things Ben 10....he loves the cartoons so I was a little nervous about ordering this movie, but he loved it.  He watches it all of the time.  If your child loves Ben 10 they will love this movie since they can identify with a real boy named Ben.
Bought this movie for my 5yr. old. He LOVES everything Ben 10! Movie was cheap and the quality of the disc is great!
Love doing business with Amazon!  They have always come thru and everything I've ordered has always come in excellent shape!  Thanks Amazon!  My son loves this movie and you had the best price!
I ordered this for my Grandson for Valentine's Day.  Ben 10 is his favorite.  He watches this movie daily. I would recommend it for any one with a Ben 10 fan in the family.
This was a gift for a 7 yr old.  However, the 8 and 10 year old boys were happy watching it as well at Christmas.  This was one of the favorite gifts for our Ben 10 fan.

My two sons, ages 6 and 4, are huge Ben 10 fans. They started with the original TV cartoon, Ben 10 and now watch Ben 10: Alien Force. They have Ben 10 Omnitrix F/X watches (we paid less than $20 each back then) and my oldest son even dressed as Ben 10 for Halloween, although we found a cheaper way to complete the costume. With such a loyal following it wasn't surprising that our sons gave this movie a 5-star recommendation. They were excited to see the live-action Ben 10, especially the aliens, Heatblast, Grey Matter, Diamondhead and Wildmutt. The special effects were good enough to entertain the 6-and-under audience. I wasn't nearly as entertained by the movie. However, I chuckled a couple times watching The Six Million Dollar Man eating squirrel jerky and running around in a costume that made him look like a cousin of Larry the Cable Guy. In summary, I recommend this for your die-hard Ben 10 fans. While the production values of a direct-to-video release can't compete with the visuals of the original cartoon, the excitement here is derived from seeing live-action characters.

I thought this movie was pretty good. the special effects was neat. not bad for a strat to dvd movie. i'm suprised they didn't realese it into theaters. oh, well it was still pretty good. if your a fan of the show then you'll love this movie. it's a must see
A really good kids movie if they like Ben10.  I enjoyed watching it with my 8 year old son, but would not watch it on my own.  Definitely geared towards kids.  Villians are scary, but not terrifying.

Directed by Alex Winter(who starred in The Lost Boys & Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure) comes Ben 10: Race Against Time; a live-action movie based on the Ben 10 cartoon show from Cartoon Network. Ben 10 is about ten-year-old Ben Tennyson's discovery of a device called the Omnitrix that allows him to change his form into that of ten aliens. Hence the name of Ben 10. The plot revolves around an alien known as Eon. Grandpa Max tells Ben that Eon was the first alien the Plumbers(a group he is part of) ever faced, and that they thought they'd locked him up. Instead, when Grandpa Max leads the kids there, they find out Eon has escaped. Grandpa Max feels that Eon will be after his doomsday device known as the Hands of Armageddon. Heatblast, Wildmutt, Diamondhead & Grey Matter were the only alien forms presented in the movie and were a real blast to see. I really loved the movie myself. It does the series justice. I wish Cartoon Network would make more movies of Ben 10 or a live-action tv series...it would definitely be cool if they did.

The movie stars: Lee Majors, Graham Phillips, Haley Ramm, Christien Anholt and Robert Picardo. It clocks in at around 90 minutes and is the most fun you'll ever waste your time on. I really liked this movie and plan to get into the series alot more. Check it out!!!

One of my sons favorite movies.  It is suspenseful and a great live action adaptation to the original cartoon. Years later he still enjoys this movie.  A great buy.
My young grandsons liked this a lot.  What cartoons should be

It's great movie, kind of slow and didn't keep younger kids attention due to not cartoon. But my 6 year old loved it.
 I  wasn't happy with the fact I bought new and it came in the wrapper, BUT it was still scratched all over the dvd..not  sure if shippers fault or factory fault. I did not return due to the hassle of it and it was my son's Christmas present from santa. You get what you get when order online.
